1001.html:
Hi there—Michael here, co-founder and CEO of Nylas. 

We've got two new features to share today. Nylas N1 now supports reminders for sent messages and attachment previews on macOS!

     

    Set reminders for sent messages

    Following up at the right time is the key to maintaining momentum in any conversation. That’s why N1’s automated reminders are so powerful.

    Starting in the 0.4.204 release of N1, you can now create reminders on previously sent messages (in addition to new messages). These reminders will bring the thread back to the top of your inbox if you don't receive a reply by the time you specify.

     

    Preview attachments

    Our latest release also includes an attachment handling upgrade for Mac users. On macOS, you can now preview attachments using the space key or the new quick look icon. Attachment items will now also display a thumbnail preview for the file when available.

    And in case you missed it, we've launched some other new features recently too:

    • Undo send. Everyone hits "send" just a moment too soon once in a while. Now you can click Undo and the message will be saved to your Drafts folder instead. You can choose the time window for the Undo function in Preferences > General.
    • Thread sharing. With a click of the Share button, you can create a unique URL to share an email thread with teammates and partners. The link will let them see the conversation as it is updated in real time. Curious about what you can do with shared threads? Check out this blog post.

    We want to hear what you think about these new features! Give them a try—then drop us a line at hello@nylas.com.

     

    What's new on the Nylas blog

    In our latest post on the Nylas blog, I discuss how the next generation of enterprise software will leverage rich data integrations to deliver sophisticated capabilities across traditional boundaries . The piece, originally published by insideBIGDATA, explores the three major trends I see driving productivity and collaboration in enterprises today. 

    Happy emailing,

    Michael (@grinich)
    CEO and Co-Founder, Nylas

     
     
    You're receiving this email because you expressed interest in Nylas!
    Preferences  |  Unsubscribe

1005.html:
Account  |  Customer Services
Dear Saravana Kumar,

Thank you for ordering from Microsoft on 29 November 2016. The following email is a summary of your order. Please use this as your proof of purchase. If you paid by credit card, please look for MSFT*MICROSOFTSTORE on your credit card billing statement.



Note: If your order contains download products, you can complete the download by looking up your order using the information and link below. When the order summary appears, click on the Download link next to the product name. If your order contains physical products, you will receive a separate email notification when your products have shipped.

To look up your order, please visit your account page and use your Microsoft account information for access.

Your Order and Billing Information:
Order Number: 12536063811
Order Date: 29 November 2016

Saravana Kumar
No 51, Bigstreet Triplicane
Chennai Tamil Nadu 600005
India
919791076616
sark@sarkware.com



Payment:
VISA
************3658
082019

Product SKU: QQ2-00031
Product Name: Office 365 Personal
Unit Price: ₹3,299.00
Qty Ordered: 1
Amount: ₹3,299.00




Subtotal: ₹3,299.00
Tax: ₹0.00

Total: ₹3,299.00

Additional Product Information:

Office 365 Personal -

Thanks for purchasing a 12-month subscription to Office 365 Personal. Your credit card will now be charged. At the end of your term, your subscription will automatically renew and you’ll be charged the then-current price (subject to change) unless you cancel before the renewal date.


Follow these steps to install Office:

1. Click on the Install button above. This will take you to Office.com/myaccount.


2. On Office.com/myaccount, click Install. If a dialog box pops up, click Run to start the installation.


3. Follow the installation wizard instructions to finish installing Office. Office will install in the background. You may start using Office programs during the installation. Please do not go offline or restart your computer while Office is installing.


You do not need a product key. Office was automatically activated upon purchase. If you decide to install Office later, go to www.office.com/myaccount and then follow steps 2 and 3 above. Login with the same Microsoft account username and password you just used to purchase Office. From there, you may install Office 365 on multiple devices, manage your subscription services, and check your billing date.


If you need help with download, installation, or activation of your purchase, please call us, or go to Microsoftstore.com and chat with an Answer Tech anytime, 24/7. We'll provide free, unlimited support to help get you up and running. Click here for frequently asked questions about Office 365.







ADDITIONAL QUESTIONS?

View our help pages, read our return policy, and view your account online.

Please note: This email message was sent from a notification-only address that cannot accept incoming email. Please do not reply to this message.

Sincerely,
Microsoft Store Customer Services
Microsoft Regional Sales Corp.,
438B Alexandra Road, #04-09/12, Block B,
Alexandra Technopark, Singapore, 119968.

1019.html:
Also in this issue: Shopkey, New Reports, MPop Cash Drawer, and new customer reports.
Login to your account
Partner Newsletter
Meet the residents of the Shopify Partner Accelerator
We rented WeWork offices in New York, London, Montreal, and Austin, and filled them with 17 bright-eyed creatives. The goal? To create an environment where ecommerce freelancers and entrepreneurs can flourish: find their first client, make their first hire, build their first empire.
  Meet them now  
Use Script Editor to apply in-cart discounts
Shopify's Script Editor allows you to write scripts in Ruby that can modify the prices and properties of line items in your customer’s cart. Use scripts to automatically apply discounts to a cart based on its items and properties.
  Get the app  
How to make API calls in 6 steps
Check out our free step-by-step tutorial on how to make API calls and take your app development to the next level.
  Get started  
Put your client’s store at their fingertips with Shopkey
Your clients can use Shopkey, Shopify’s new iOS keyboard app, to direct customers straight to their product page while chatting with them. Shopkey provides a searchable list of products to include in any iMessage, Messenger or Snapchat message.
  Learn more  

FREE PARTNER WEBINAR

Dirty Little Tricks From the Dark Corners of Front-End
Vitaly Friedman, Editor-in-Chief, Smashing Magazine
December 13, 2016 1:00pm EST 5:00pm UTC

Discover practical, front-end techniques and clever ideas that you can apply in real-life projects. From building up-to-date pattern libraries to dealing with common problems in CSS, Vitaly will share his secret techniques alongside tangible examples to illustrate how you can solve development problems smarter and faster.

  Register now  
New Customer Reports
Help your clients gain insight on their customers, including their average order count, average order totals, and expected purchase value. Shopify merchants have five reports available to them on the Shopify plan, and two additional reports available if they’re on the Advanced or Plus plan.
  Learn more  

FEATURED APP

Covet.Pics

Help your clients create shoppable galleries, tag their products, and sell directly from their photos with Covet.Pics. It’s free to try in development stores.

  Try it for free  
Introducing GoDaddy Connect
Our new integration with GoDaddy allows your clients to automatically connect custom domains to a shop, simply by signing into their GoDaddy account. We now configure both their A record and CNAME in the background with just a few clicks.
  Learn more  

Unsubscribe  |  View this email on the web  |  www.shopify.com/partners

Shopify  |  150 Elgin Street, Ottawa ON, K2P 1L4
